reviewText: This DVD is almost worthless, because the basic step he uses in all of his patterns is no longer used, at least not in the Arizona, or California. Very little music, and the follower seems bored. The patterns are very good, so one star for that. The basic step used in this DVD is not used (anywhere?). Therefore, following the patterns in very difficult to follow with the footwork, and his timing. The Grant Austin Cha Cha Vol. One - Beginner / Intermediatein a much better one to start with. Also, with all the DVD instructional merchandise for sale at Amazon, the DVD's should be only addendum to professional instruction.
